sentences.sentence: A bit of embrocation will soothe your bruised knee.
sentences.translation: 用一点搽剂可使你那青肿的膝部消肿。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion Wei-chi embrocation is safe for external use.
sentences.translation: 结论威驰搽剂是一种安全性较好的外用制剂。

sentences.sentence: Results Wei-chi embrocation had no irritative reaction to intact skin, but has mild stimulation to injured skin.
sentences.translation: 结果应用威驰搽剂对家兔的完整皮肤无刺激性，但对家兔的损伤皮肤有轻度刺激性。
